name: BlitzKeep Unleashed
description: BlitzKeep Unleashed, where billiards meets a roguelite RPG! Or maybe pinball meets an RPG? Something like that! Level up, defeat enemies and bosses, buy permanent upgrades and new classes, play local coop, and more in procedurally-generated dungeons across 10 realms and 40 levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent Storage: 1 GB available space
